title: France : public debt 2017 to 2022
summary: Overall Share of GDP has decreased over the Year.
Share of GDP is slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest Share of GDP, of value 97.1 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Share of GDP about 96.1 was reached at Year 2020
